amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part A of House Report 117-420 as en bloc No. 6: Nos. 98, 99, 101, 102, 108, 114, 119, 121, 124, 126, 127, 129, 130, 132, 138, 140, 144, 146, 154, 162, 165, 166, 169, 170, 171, 173, 176, 177, 178, and 185.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendments (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 204 (Roll no. 372).

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A006) offered by Ms. DeLauro.
